qr_instructions: After clicking the login button, show the QR code on your badge to the camera.
kvkk_acceptance: By logging into the application, I accept the KVKK (Law on the Protection of Personal Data).
privacy_policy_title: PERSONAL DATA PROTECTION LIGHTING TEXT and COMMERCIAL ELECTRONIC COMMUNICATION CONSENT
privacy_policy_content: In accordance with the Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data (Law), your personal data is processed by D Event Tourism Organization Services Limited Company as the data controller.
no_token: Token not found. Redirecting to login page.
no_permission_question: You don't have permission to ask questions!
no_permission_mail: You don't have permission to send mail!
speaker: Speaker
no_questions_allowed: Questions are not allowed for this session
session_not_started: The session has not started yet!
question_sent_success: Your question has been sent successfully!
error_occurred: An error occurred, please try again!
please_select_option: Please select one of the options below:
already_voted: You have already voted in this debate.
vote_sent_success: Your vote has been sent successfully.
vote_send_error: There was an error while sending your vote.
unauthorized_access: Unauthorized access. Please log in again.
missing_info: Token, participant, or debate information is missing. Please log in again.
